pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Monday, June 27, 2022 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Elmau, Germany

Private meetings

9:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will hold a bilateral meeting with the Chancellor of Germany, Olaf Scholz.

Schloss Elmau

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity at the start of the meeting

9:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will hold a bilateral meeting with the Prime Minister of Japan, Kishida Fumio.

Schloss Elmau

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity at the start of the meeting

10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will participate in the G7 Working Session, entitled The World in Conflict: Exchange on Ukraine.

Schloss Elmau

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity and host broadcast coverage

12:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in the Working Luncheon with G7 Leaders and international partner countries and organizations.

Schloss Elmau

Note for media:

  • Host broadcast coverage

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in the Official Family Photo with G7 Leaders and international partner countries and organizations.

Schloss Elmau

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity and host broadcast coverage

2:35 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a bilateral meeting with the President of Senegal, Macky Sall.

Schloss Elmau

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity at the start of the meeting

3:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in the Working Session with G7 Leaders and international partner countries and organizations, entitled Stronger Together: Addressing Food Security and Advancing Gender Equality.

Schloss Elmau

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity and host broadcast coverage

5:50 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a bilateral meeting with the Prime Minister of India, Narendra Modi.

Schloss Elmau

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity at the start of the meeting

6:10 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a bilateral meeting with the President of Indonesia, Joko Widodo.

Schloss Elmau

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity at the start of the meeting

6:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend a dinner with G7 Leaders and international partner countries and organizations hosted by the Chancellor of Germany, Olaf Scholz.

Schloss Elmau

Note for media:

  • Host broadcast coverage
